page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: {The following pages relate to the area {of South West Leicestershire which {includes the villages of Cadeby and {Sutton Cheney, and attempts to reflect {the overall rural aspect of the {surrounding district. { {Places discussed in greater detail {include:- Cadeby village, Sutton {Cheney village, Market Bosworth Park, {and the Battlefield of Bosworth. { {Further topics investigate local {Agriculture, Industry, Employment, {Recreation, Architecture and Ecology. { {Other items of interest include:- {The Cadeby Light Railway, The Cadeby {Steam Festival, Brass Rubbing and The {Battle of Bosworth Quincentenial {Celebrations.
